briefTitle: Study to Assess Safety and Efficacy of Ticagrelor (AZD6140) Versus Clopidogrel in Asian/Japanese Patients With Non-ST or ST Elevation Acute Coronary Syndromes (ACS)

eligibilityModule.eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Provision of signed informed consent
* Index event of non-ST or ST segment elevation ACS

Exclusion Criteria:

* Index event is an acute complication of percutaneous coronary intervention
* Patient has undergone Percutaneous Coronary Intervention (PCI) after the index event before the first dose of study treatment
* Oral anticoagulation therapy that cannot be stopped
* The conditions associated with increased risk of bradycardiac events

outcomeMeasures.title: Major Bleeding
outcomeMeasures.description: Time to first occurrence of any major bleeding event (adjudicated by an independent Clinical Endpoint Committee (ICEC)). 1-year event rate (%) estimated via Kaplan-Meier method.

outcomeMeasures.title: Major Adverse Cardiac Events (MACE)
outcomeMeasures.description: Time to first occurrence of any event from the composite of death from vascular causes, Myocardial Infarction (MI) and stroke (adjudicated by an ICEC). 1-year event rate (%) estimated via Kaplan-Meier method.

outcomeMeasures.title: Major and Minor Bleeding
outcomeMeasures.description: Time to first occurrence of any major or minor bleeding event (adjudicated by an independent Clinical Endpoint Committee (ICEC)). 1-year event rate (%) estimated via Kaplan-Meier method.

outcomeMeasures.title: Composite of All-cause Mortality, MI or Stroke
outcomeMeasures.description: Time to first occurrence of any event from the composite of death from any causes, Myocardial Infarction (MI) and stroke (adjudicated by an ICEC). 1-year event rate (%) estimated via Kaplan-Meier method.
